First Edition, First Printing (Full Number Line). Not price-clipped ($30.00 price intact). Published by PublicAffairs, 2006. Octavo. Black boards over gray boards stamped in silver. Book is like new; clean with no writing or names. Sharp corners and spine straight. Binding tight and pages crisp. Light toning to pages. Dust jacket is like new with very light shelf wear and a few nicks. 483 pages. ISBN: 9781586483029.
